verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> while the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> were <S%H2583>camping<s%> by the <S%H9407>spring<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H5674>proceeding<s%> on by <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> and by <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H5674>proceeding<s%> on in the <S%H314>rear<s%> with <S%H397>Achish.<s%>

Then the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> [are] <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> [doing here]?" And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> "Is <S%H2088>this<s%> not <S%H1732>David,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> with me <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> [rather] <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3972>fault<s%> in him from the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H5307>deserted<s%> [to me] to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>?"

But the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H7107>angry<s%> with him, and the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Make the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> that he may <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you have <S%H6485>assigned<s%> him, and do not let him <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> with us, <S%H3808>lest<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> he <S%H1961>become<s%> an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> to us. For with <S%H4100>what<s%> could <S%H2088>this<s%> [man] <S%H7521>make<s%> himself <S%H7521>acceptable<s%> to his <S%H113>lord<s%>? [Would it] not [be] with the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>?

"Is <S%H2088>this<s%> not <S%H1732>David,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H9420>sing<s%> in the <S%H4246>dances,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586>'Saul<s%> has <S%H5221>slain<s%> his <S%H505>thousands,<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%>'?"

Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "[As] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> you [have been] <S%H3477>upright,<s%> and your <S%H3318>going<s%> out and your <S%H935>coming<s%> in with me in the <S%H4264>army<s%> are <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight;<s%> for I have not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> in you from the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H935>coming<s%> to me to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> Nevertheless, you are not <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5633>lords.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> that you may not <S%H6213>displease<s%> <S%H7451><s%> <S%H5869><s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> "But <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%>? And <S%H4100>what<s%> have you <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H5650>servant<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> I <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I may not <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H340>enemies<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>?"

But <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> like an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H389>nevertheless<s%> the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'He must not <S%H5927>go<s%> up with us to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then <S%H7925>arise<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of your <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> with you, and as soon as you have <S%H7925>arisen<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and have <S%H215>light,<s%> <S%H1980>depart.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early,<s%> he and his <S%H376>men,<s%> to <S%H1980>depart<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>
